title: Album cover fonts used by "La Roux"
content:
Hey folks. I recently started listening to British electro/pop group "La Roux" and noticed they have some pretty cool looking typefaces on the covers that I couldn't ID.

I'm interested in all three used in these two covers:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109052229im_/http:/typophile.com/files/KivaL_4739.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109052229im_/http:/typophile.com/files/z2T3f_6104.jpg)

Thanks.
author: dymaxion

comments.content:
Really, nice types!

I think the IHOF Counter have the same 'feel'  
Specially the "Counter Line"

[http://www.p22.com/ihof/counter.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109052229/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/counter.html "http://www.p22.com/ihof/counter.html")
